column2: Biden's Earth Day Climate Summit; New Questions About Capitol Insurrection: 'BradCast' 4/22/2021
column5: On today's BradCast: After a disastrous four year mistake by the name of Donald Trump the United States under the leadership of Joe Biden is taking the lead once again on our global climate emergency on Earth Day 2021. Or at least trying to.
